content.prompt: Given an integer variable n entered by the user from keyboard, complete the following code in order to figure out how many times can we divide n by 2 to get down to 1. Store the result in an integer variable called count. E.g. 1: if the value of n entered by the user is 2, the value of count will be 1. E.g. 2: if the value of n entered by the user is 4, the value of count will be 2. E.g. 3: if the value of n entered by the user is 8, the value of count will be 3.
